name: Wise IAS: Study Materials & IAS Guidance
description: Best e-Courses for IAS Exam like History, Geography, Polity & Veterinary Science Optional. Crack IAS Exam in 1st Attempt: With Our Guidance & Free Study Materials for GS & Veterinary Science Optional.  Visit Wise IAS Here:  https://www.wiseias.com/  Wise IAS App is an Educational App .Wise IAS App will help you in Preparation for Various competitive Exams such as UPSC and Veterinary Science Optional in CSE and IFoS exams.  1. ONE STOP SOLUTION: Wise IAS App is an One Stop Solution for Video Lectures & Notes for General Studies & Veterinary Science, Daily Current Affairs, Daily Newspapers discussion, Toppers Strategy, Analysis of Previous years Papers, & Motivational Videos for both Prelims, Mains & Interview.  2. Nominal FEES: Wise IAS App provides you a Free content for UPSC CSE. You dont have to pay high fees for lectures and Study materials. There is very low subscription fees to use Wise App.  3. FIRST APP FOR VETERINARIANS: People studying Veterinary science will nowhere find the material that well provide you such as PDF short notes, video lectures, personalised guidance etc  4. SIMPLIFIED: You get to scroll through various web pages daily to search for the study material and right guidance which is a hefty task plus time-consuming. So, WISE IAS App is here to provide you solution to this by providing all of the above at one place. It will save you a lot of time.  5. EXPERT GUIDANCE: Various IAS/IPS/IRS officers will assist you timely through live sessions and personalized guidance.  6. SHARING: You can share your notes, answers, ideas and strategies with a community of over thousands of students with this app and vice versa.  7. SMART APP: Our focus is to make learning smarter, easier and student friendly.
